entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
